text:
COHFIEENTXAL
TO* KAEB Executive Committee and Directors
FROM: Harry Skornia
SUBJECT: Proposed Budget
DATE: Itech 29* 1954
Herewith proposed budget* l511 have numerous supporting Stems for
discussion at Columbus, such as for committees to begin to pay part of
own exponses for meetings, etc.
Important NOTE
By agreement with Graydon: Only Executive Committee will meet Monday
during the day. Full Directors meeting begins at 8:00 P.M. Monday.
